Articles.Content:
Why isnt the KSP soundtack implemented in game?

Theres lots of sounds in the Game folder that seems good to go but they arent in the game yet?

The KSP soundtrack is great btw

Squad are currently looking for someone with experience in this area (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/careers.php), so I assume they are going to overhaul the existing sounds and provide new ones in the future.

Squad are currently looking for someone with experience in this area (http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/careers.php), so I assume they are going to overhaul the existing sounds and provide new ones in the future.

Oh alight then.

To bad because the sounds that are in right now are pretty neat
